attributes.action: Change the law on food labelling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the law changed to ensure nut and other allergy sufferes no longer have to play Russian roulette. A product should state clearly whether or not it contains nuts or other allergens and should not be allowed to use the "MAY CONTAIN" as a get out clause. There should be no margin for "it may contain", a product should state either "it does contain" or "it does not contain".  This should also extend to all food outlets.
